pages.text: Lamp is a projectile spell form, which will track surrounding non-friendly units within a certain range. $(br)$(t:Raising these values of the form can increase the profit)$(li)$(#6C7B8B)Growth Needs：$(/t)$(t:Increasing the Range of the form can increase the profit)$(li2)$(#EE6363)Range$(/t)$()$(br)$(t:Effect of Spell Attributes on Functional Spells)$(li)$(#6C7B8B)Magical Efficacy：$(/t)$(t:Functional spells will have their force bonus reduced to 0.5)$(li2)$(#00CED1)Force：0.5$(/t)$()$(t:The range of functional spells is unaffected)$(li2)$(#EE6363)Range：1.0$(/t)$()$(t:The duration of functional spells is unaffected)$(li2)$(#FFB90F)Duration：1.0$(/t)$()$(br2)
